*div1 type="summary"* *p*Isaac Mathews to Austin, May 31, 1825. Traded a horse for 640 acres of land. Wants title.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Alexandria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-31-1825">May 31st 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Auston Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*S P D Auston*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir there is a gentlemen that lives in your *location_mentioned*colleney */location_mentioned*by the name of*person_mentioned* Mr- Issac House*/person_mentioned*, who lay sick at my *location_mentioned*house */location_mentioned*in the Month of *date_mentioned n="08-xx-1824">August last*/date_mentioned*, several days, during which time he informed me that He was about to trade for a *location_mentioned*league of land */location_mentioned*from you, and that his business cald him home (he said that he had been living there for two years) and that he was not able to travel for to get back to attend to his business on foot (which he was travling in that way) and he would give me *location_mentioned*six hundred and fourty acres of land lying on the watirs of the Burnard */location_mentioned*for a poney that would ansur for to carrey him home, on the faith and credit of his report I agreed to do so. and at the same time expecting to emmigrate to that country, was the indusement for me to run the risk of the trade with him, he is a single man and he makes his home at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr. Varnor*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* my wish to procure a title for the said land in my name through *person_mentioned*Mr- James Browne*/person_mentioned*, who will bee the *person_mentioned*barer */person_mentioned*of this to you. and any expences that will occur on the same *person_mentioned*Mr- Brown */person_mentioned*will discharge it for me. I will write to *person_mentioned*Mr- House*/person_mentioned* about the same, your complyance with the above request will mutch oblige your humble servant*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Isaac Mathews*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*I hold *person_mentioned*Mr- House*/person_mentioned*s obligation for the sd land which I will intrust with *person_mentioned*Mr- Browne*/person_mentioned* for the said arrangement*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*I M*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
